description: Dashboard visualizing ContainerLogV2 records collected by Azure Monitor

options.content:
## ContainerLogV2 with Kubernetes Metadata 

Kubernetes Metadata consists of the Pod labels, Pod Annotations, Image, ImageHash, ImageRepo and PodUID etc. 
Kubernetes Metadata collection enables to have rich Metadata with Log record and Metadata enables to co-relate logs with Kubernetes resources.

This dashboard visualizes ContainerLogV2 data with Kubernetes Metadata. Read more in the documentation here:  

Before starting, please ensure that: 
1. Container Insights enabled to selected AKS cluster
2. Kubernetes Metadata collection and ContainerLogV2 enabled

Read more on annotation based filtering:

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(
    isnotnull(LogMessage.level), tolower(tostring(LogMessage.level)),
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(emerg|alert|crit|critical)\b", "critical",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(err|error)\b", "error",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(warn|warning)\b", "warning",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(info|information|notice)\b", "info",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(debug|verbose)\b", "debug",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\btrace\b", "trace",
    LogSource == "stderr", "error",
    "unknown"
))
| where LogLevel == "critical"
| count

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(
    isnotnull(LogMessage.level), tolower(tostring(LogMessage.level)),
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(emerg|alert|crit|critical)\b", "critical",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(err|error)\b", "error",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(warn|warning)\b", "warning",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(info|information|notice)\b", "info",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(debug|verbose)\b", "debug",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\btrace\b", "trace",
    LogSource == "stderr", "error",
    "unknown"
))
| where LogLevel == "warning"
| count

| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(

| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])

| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(
    isnotnull(LogMessage.level), tolower(tostring(LogMessage.level)),
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(emerg|alert|crit|critical)\b", "critical",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(err|error)\b", "error",

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(
    isnotnull(LogMessage.level), tolower(tostring(LogMessage.level)),
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(emerg|alert|crit|critical)\b", "critical",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(err|error)\b", "error",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(warn|warning)\b", "warning",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(info|information|notice)\b", "info",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(debug|verbose)\b", "debug",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\btrace\b", "trace",
    LogSource == "stderr", "error",
    "unknown"
))
| summarize Count = count() by LogLevel

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(
    isnotnull(LogMessage.level), tolower(tostring(LogMessage.level)),
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(emerg|alert|crit|critical)\b", "critical",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(err|error)\b", "error",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(warn|warning)\b", "warning",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(info|information|notice)\b", "info",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(debug|verbose)\b", "debug",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\btrace\b", "trace",
    LogSource == "stderr", "error",
    "unknown"
))
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), LogLevel
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize TotalCount = count()

ContainerLogV2
| where TimeGenerated > ago(20min)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend DataVolumeMB = _BilledSize /1024/1024
| summarize TotalDataVolumeMB = round(sum(DataVolumeMB), 4)

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), PodName
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m), ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc 
| render timechart

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize LogCount = count() by Computer

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize LogCount = count() by PodName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| summarize LogCount = count() by ContainerName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| extend NamespaceInput = "$Namespace"
| where PodNamespace =~ "$Namespace"
| extend PodLabels = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand PodLabels
| extend labelKey = tostring(bag_keys(PodLabels)[0])
| where labelKey in ($LabelKey)
| extend labelVal = tostring(PodLabels[labelKey])
| where labelVal in ($LabelValue)
| extend logMessagePreview = tolower(substring(LogMessage, 0, 100))
| extend LogLevel = iif(isnotempty(LogLevel), LogLevel, case(
    isnotnull(LogMessage.level),                                          tolower(tostring(LogMessage.level)),
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(emerg|alert|crit|critical)\b",         "critical",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(err|error)\b",                         "error",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(warn|warning)\b",                      "warning",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(info|information|notice)\b",           "info",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\b(debug|verbose)\b",                     "debug",
    logMessagePreview matches regex @"\btrace\b",                               "trace",
    LogSource == "stderr",                                                      "error",
    "unknown"
))
| project TimeGenerated, KubernetesMetadata, LogLevel, LogMessage, Computer, PodName, ContainerName, ContainerId

panels.title: Last 100 Log Records - Click any row to access full list

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters'
| where id =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| extend props = parse_json(properties)
| extend lawResourceId = tostring(props.addonProfiles.omsAgent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID)
| extend LAWS = iff(isnotempty(lawResourceId), lawResourceId, tostring(props.addonProfiles.omsagent.config.logAnalyticsWorkspaceResourceID))
| project LAWS

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| distinct PodNamespace

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| extend PodNamespace = "$Namespace"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| where isnotempty(LabelName)
| distinct LabelName

ContainerLogV2
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId =~ "/subscriptions/$Subscription/resourcegroups/$rg/providers/Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters/$Cluster"
| where  PodNamespace == "$Namespace"
| where isnotempty(KubernetesMetadata)
| extend LabelsJson = KubernetesMetadata.podLabels
| mv-expand LabelsJson
| extend LabelName = tostring(bag_keys(LabelsJson)[0])
| where LabelName in ($LabelKey)
| extend LabelValue = tostring(LabelsJson[LabelName])
| where isnotempty(LabelValue)
| distinct LabelValue

title: Azure Monitor / Container Insights / ContainerLogV2
